Bash(PGPASSWORD='olbGqG9fodtRuzZP' psql "postgresql://postgres.gghpqgwrruwdeooathig:olbGqG9fodtRuzZP@aws-1-ap-south-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "
-- Verify TALK3 coupon
SELECT 
    code,
    discount_percent,
    is_active,
    CASE WHEN employee_id IS NULL THEN ''System Coupon'' ELSE ''Employee Coupon'' END as coupon_type
FROM employee_coupons 
WHERE code = ''TALK3'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='olbGqG9fodtRuzZP' psql "postgresql://postgres.gghpqgwrruwdeooathig:olbGqG9fodtRuzZP@aws-1-ap-south-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "
-- Check the structure of employee_coupons table
SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_name = ''employee_coupons''
ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='olbGqG9fodtRuzZP' psql "postgresql://postgres.gghpqgwrruwdeooathig:olbGqG9fodtRuzZP@aws-1-ap-south-1.pooler.supabase.com:5432/postgres" -c "
-- Create TALK3 system coupon with 100% discount
INSERT INTO employee_coupons (
    code,
    discount_percent,
    is_active,
    employee_id,
    usage_count,
    created_at,
    updated_at
) VALUES (
    ''TALK3'',
    100,
    true,
    NULL,  -- NULL employee_id means it''s a system coupon
    0,
    NOW(),
    NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (code) DO UPDATE SET
    discount_percent = 100,
    is_active = true,
    updated_at = NOW();

-- Verify the coupon was created
SELECT 
    code,
    discount_percent,
    is_active,
    usage_count,
    CASE WHEN employee_id IS NULL THEN ''System Coupon'' ELSE ''Employee Coupon'' END as coupon_type
FROM employee_coupons 
WHERE code = ''TALK3'';")
